introduction.content: This document outlines the procedure for replacing a bike fork. It details the necessary steps, precautions, and references to relevant documentation.

step.title: 1. Introduction
step.content: This document outlines the procedure for replacing a bike fork. It details the necessary steps, precautions, and references to relevant documentation.

step.title: 2. Prerequisites & Materials
step.item: Standard Bike Tools (Wrenches, Allen Keys, etc.)
Reference Documentation (as indicated throughout the procedure)

step.title: 3. Preliminary Requirements
step.item: Ensure the bike is securely positioned on a repair stand or stable surface.
Disconnect any electrical components if applicable.

subsection.title: 4.1. 1. Preparation
subsection.item: Remove Front Wheel: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA0-3-0-00-00-AA-520/> for instructions on front wheel removal.
Remove Front Brakes: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA1-2-0-00-00-AA-520/> for instructions on front brake removal.

subsection.title: 4.2. 2. Fork Removal
subsection.item: Remove Fork: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-520/> for instructions on fork removal.
Change Bike Axis: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-93A/> for instructions on changing the bike axis.

subsection.title: 4.3. 3. Fork Installation
subsection.item: Install New Fork: Options depend on the specific fork model.

subsection.title: 4.4. 4. Reassembly
subsection.item: Install Front Brakes: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA1-2-0-00-00-AA-720/> for instructions on front brake installation.
Install Front Wheel: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-DA0-3-0-00-00-AA-720/> for instructions on front wheel installation.

subsection.title: 4.5. 5. Testing & Verification
subsection.item: Fork Installation Test: Refer to documentation <dmref:S1000BIKE-D00-0-0-01-00-AA-341/> to verify proper fork installation.
Front Brakes Test: Refer to documentation <dmref:BRAKE-DA1-0-0-00-00-AA-341/> to verify proper brake function.

conclusion.content: This procedure provides a general guideline for bike fork replacement. Always consult the manufacturer's specifications and safety guidelines for your specific bike and components. Ensure all connections are secure before operating the bike.
